data.text: @Atipico1996 I'd thought, it was lower vaccine rates & efficacy, especially with seniors, kids; ALSO virulence of BA.2? FAR more breakthrough & less recent hybrid immunity. A perfect storm headed our way? Yuppies make us SICK (get it?)
@HubertineAucler @Atipico1996 Awful. Are they vaccinated or kids under 5?
@BreezieLT @Atipico1996 yes, but a lot of young kids are also dying because of covid
@Atipico1996 @darylgibson Curious which vaccine they're getting...the Chinese version I guess!? May explain the numbers...

@HubertineAucler @Atipico1996 Is it all because of BA.2?  I had read a little while ago HK was also struggling with vaccination rates among its elderly population. 

Fewer vaccinated ppl + increase in immune evasion + more virulent variant = this scenario?
